plays.text: Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Boarding Espen Knutsen
Goal scored by Mathieu Dandenault unassisted
Goal scored by Mike Sillinger assisted by Grant Marshall and Jean-Luc Grand-Pierre
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for Elbowing Sean Avery
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Tomas Holmstrom and Brendan Shanahan
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Holding Chris Nielsen
Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Brett Hull and Boyd Devereaux
Penalty to Kevin Dineen 2 minutes for Slashing Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Jean-Luc Grand-Pierre 2 minutes for Tripping Brendan Shanahan
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Igor Larionov
Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Hooking Tyler Wright
Penalty to Lyle Odelein 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Manny Legace
Goal scored by Sean Avery assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Holding Kevin Dineen served by Sean Avery
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Slashing Serge Aubin
